Django
======

_Django makes it easier to build better web apps more quickly and with less code._

[Get started with Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/start/)

Meet Django
===========

Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. Built by experienced developers, it takes care of much of the hassle of web development, so you can focus on writing your app without needing to reinvent the wheel. It’s free and open source.

Ridiculously fast.

Django was designed to help developers take applications from concept to completion as quickly as possible.

Reassuringly secure.

Django takes security seriously and helps developers avoid many common security mistakes.

Exceedingly scalable.

Some of the busiest sites on the web leverage Django’s ability to quickly and flexibly scale.

[Learn more about Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/start/overview/)

Join the Community
------------------

[### Forum - Post a question](https://forum.djangoproject.com/)[### Discord - Chat with us](https://chat.djangoproject.com/)

[Back to Top](https://www.djangoproject.com/#top)

[Download _latest release: 5.1.7_](https://www.djangoproject.com/download/) [Django documentation](https://docs.djangoproject.com/)

Support Django!
---------------

![Image 1: Support Django!](https://static.djangoproject.com/img/fundraising-heart.cd6bb84ffd33.svg)

*   [FabDev donated to the Django Software Foundation to support Django development. Donate today!](https://www.djangoproject.com/fundraising/)

### Latest news

*   #### [Django security releases issued: 5.1.7, 5.0.13 and 4.2.20](https://www.djangoproject.com/weblog/2025/mar/06/security-releases/)
    
    Django 5.1.7, 5.0.13 and 4.2.20 fix one security issue.
    
    Posted by **Sarah Boyce** on March 6, 2025
*   #### [Call for Proposals for DjangoCon Africa 2025 is now open!](https://www.djangoproject.com/weblog/2025/feb/24/cfp-for-djangocon-africa-2025-is-now-open/)
    
    Propose your talk for this headline event, coming to Arusha, Tanzania in August 2025
    
    Posted by **DjangoCon Africa 2025 organizers** on Feb. 24, 2025

[More news](https://www.djangoproject.com/weblog/)

### The power of Django

*   [Object-relational mapper](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/topics/db/models/)
*   [Automatic admin interface](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/intro/tutorial02/)
*   [Robust template system](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/topics/templates/)
*   [Quick internationalization](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/stable/topics/i18n/)

[Explore more features](https://www.djangoproject.com/start/overview/)
